actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax relief to small businesses by establishing a graduated income tax rate for corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide graduted income tax rates for corporations with a maximum rate of 45 percent on income in excess of $150,000 and a minimum rate of 18 percent on income not in excess of $25,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax relief to small businesses by establishing a graduated income tax rate for corporations.
